description:
The head of the Hydra family, which is one of the three founding families of the Nebulis Sovereignty. He`s a handsome man in his prime, with the air of elegance about him. His stance is neutral regarding the competition for the right for the throne between the Lou family and the Zoa family. Known as "the Wave," he is the wave astral mage, who controls invisible waves.
Source: Official page
name: Talisman
